message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing deal! This product is a rare find, and I'm confident you'll love it. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to get your hands on something truly unique. The price is $100, a steal for something of this caliber. What do you say? Will you take it home today?
I'll take it, thank you!

It's a top-of-the-line item that will exceed your expectations in every way. The price may seem steep at $100, but trust me, it's worth every penny. You won't find a better deal anywhere else, I guarantee it. What do you say? Are you ready to take your experience to the next level?
I'll take it, I'm hoping for a better outcome this time!

I'll take it, thanks for the offer!
